document.full_text: britain said on wednesday it was still seeking condemnation at the united nations of syria's crackdown on protests despite being rebuffed in an attempt last week.
document.title: britain says still seeking u.n. condemnation of syria
lines_and_colors: britain said on wednesday it was still seeking condemnation at the united nations of syria's crackdown on protests despite being rebuffed in an attempt last week.
